mapper.select: select org.name as areaname, p.pertainareaid, sum(decode(n.CONSENTTOINVESTMENT, null, decode((select VOTE_STATUS from RCM_DECISION_RESOLUTION where VOTE_STATUS = 2 and formal_id=p.businessid),null,1,0), 0)) as being, --未出决策通知书 sum(decode(d.DECISION_RESULT,1,1,decode(n.CONSENTTOINVESTMENT, 1, 1, 0))) as done1, sum(decode(d.DECISION_RESULT,2,1,decode(n.CONSENTTOINVESTMENT, 2, 1, 0))) as done2, sum(decode(d.DECISION_RESULT,3,1,decode(n.CONSENTTOINVESTMENT, 3, 1, 0))) as done3, sum(decode(d.DECISION_RESULT,4,1,decode(n.CONSENTTOINVESTMENT, 4, 1, 0))) as done4 from rcm_formalassessment_info p, (select * from RCM_DECISION_RESOLUTION where VOTE_STATUS = 2) d, rcm_noticedecision_info n, sys_org org where p.wf_state in ('1', '2') and p.pertainareaid is not null and p.businessid = d.formal_id(+) and p.businessid = n.projectformalid(+) and p.pertainareaid = org.orgpkvalue(+) group by org.name, p.pertainareaid
mapper.insert: insert into rcm_formalAssessment_report ( businessId, projectSize, investmentAmount, rateOfReturn, serviceType, create_date, controller_val ) values ( #{businessId}, #{projectSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{investmentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rateOfReturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{controller_val,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
